scripts.update:docker: mkdir -p data/docker && curl -s 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cibuilds/hugo/master/build-images.sh' > data/docker/build-images.sh && curl -s https://github.com/klakegg/docker-hugo/blob/master/Dockerfile-base > data/docker/Dockerfile-base
scripts.update:snap: mkdir -p data/snap && curl -H 'X-Ubuntu-Series: 16' 'https://api.snapcraft.io/api/v1/snaps/details/hugo' > data/snap/stable.json && curl -H 'X-Ubuntu-Series: 16' 'https://api.snapcraft.io/api/v1/snaps/details/hugo?channel=extended' > data/snap/extended.json
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run update:docker && npm run update:snap && hugo --ignoreCache --minify --gc
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run update:docker && npm run update:snap && hugo server --ignoreCache
